wordGroup: over the past decade 在过去的十年里

sentences.en: Women have become more assertive in the past decade.
sentences.cn: 妇女在过去十年已变得更坚定自信。

sentences.en: At least one supernova occurs per decade in our galaxy.
sentences.cn: 每十年至少有一颗超新星在我们的银河系中出现。

sentences.en: Her husband had played the trombone in the band for a decade.
sentences.cn: 她丈夫已在这支乐队吹了十年的长号。
